bug.summary: Issue creating UFS file without a parent directory
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.x Describe the bug We have been using default CreateOptions when creating a UFS file. This can fail in some configuration when a file is written to an Alluxio directory not backed by a UFS one. To Reproduce Create a file in Alluxio with CACHE_THROUGH and under a directory not backed by UFS. Expected behavior Creation should succeed and the parent directory should be created in UFS. Urgency Medium. Some data migration tasks may fail. Additional context N/A
